Uses of Class
com.psddev.dari.util.TransformerBuilder

  • Packages that use TransformerBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.psddev.dari.util  

    • Uses of TransformerBuilder in com.psddev.dari.util

      Methods in com.psddev.dari.util that return TransformerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.exclude(Class<?> objectClass, String... names)
      Excludes all the values associated with the given names when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.excludeAllFields(Class<?> objectClass)
      Excludes all the non-transient field values when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.excludeAllGetters(Class<?> objectClass)
      Excludes all the public getter values when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.includeAllFields(Class<?> objectClass)
      Includes all the non-transient field values when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.includeAllGetters(Class<?> objectClass)
      Includes all the public getter values when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.includeConstant(Class<?> objectClass, String name, Object constant)
      Includes the given constant into the given name when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.includeFields(Class<?> objectClass, String... names)
      Includes the field values with the given names when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      <F> TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.includeFunction(Class<F> objectClass, String name, TransformationFunction<F> function)
      Includes the return value from the given function into the given name when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.includeGetters(Class<?> objectClass, String... names)
      Includes the getter values with the given names when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.rename(Class<?> objectClass, String oldName, String newName)
      Renames the value associated with the given oldName to the given newName when transforming instances of the given objectClass to a map.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.setMapType(Class<? extends Map> mapType)
      Sets the type used to create the map when transforming objects.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.setMapType(Type mapType)
      Sets the type used to create the map when transforming objects.
      TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.setMapType(TypeReference<? extends Map> mapType)
      Sets the type used to create the map when transforming objects.
      <F> TransformerBuilder TransformerBuilder.transform(Class<F> objectClass, TransformationFunction<F> function)
      Transforms the instances of the given objectClass using the given function.
